section1.header: Welcome to Intelligent and Secure Systems Lab!
section1.description: The Intelligent and Secure Systems Laboratory (ISS Lab), belonging to University of San Carlos, is dedicated to researching mobile internet security and IoT security, collaborating with experts globally to develop innovative solutions and publishing findings in top international journals and conferences.

section2.description: Discover the various research and findings that showcase our dedication to innovation

section3.description: A series of insightful presentations, engaging workshops, and invaluable networking opportunities.
